subject: Basketball
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Luis Scola scored 23 points, Yao Ming added 19 points and 12 rebounds, and the Houston Rockets made a second-half surge to beat the Oklahoma City Thunder, 100-89.
snippet: Luis Scola scored 23 points, Yao Ming added 19 points and 12 rebounds, and the Houston Rockets made a second-half surge to beat the Oklahoma City Thunder, 100-89.
